language.description: Allows fast switching for multiple user accounts.
language.dialog_info:
Input the credentials of another account to add it to the fast switching selector.
Note: sessions are stored in cookies of your actual browser.

messages.collection_reset: Couldn't decrypt the saved sessions cookie - it might be corrupt. Your sessions collection has been reset. You'll need to re-add any missing ones. Please reload the page to update the switching accounts list.
messages.collection_empty: Sorry, but the sessions collection is empty. The cookie may have been removed.
messages.account_not_found: The account you're switching to wasn't found in the authorized collection.
messages.no_self_account: Please specify the credentials for an account other than the one you're logged in with.
messages.already_in: The account you specified is already in the sessions collection.
messages.invalid_token: Sorry, but the provided account switching token is invalid. Please try again.
messages.account_removal_prompt: Please confirm that you want to remove this account from the switcher on this browser.
messages.cannot_remove_self: You cannot remove the account of your current session
messages.browser_not_handled_properly: Seems that your browser didn't handle the cookie switching request properly.
messages.click_to_try_again: If the problem persists, click here and switch again.

specs.title: Required access level
specs.description:
Required level to access this feature.
Default: 240 (Coadmin)
